title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode (build 20020416), it results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Expected behavior is that when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, it should result in only one redraw of the entire client area, rather than N redraws.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the StyledText editor in word wrap mode.
2. Build version: 20020416.
3. Append N lines of text to the editor.
4. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times instead of just once.
